ygData.subject: Re: Weapons & note to Mr. Capozzi
ygData.msgSnippet: Refering to JM Capozzi s earlier post about speed over time, I
ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
<body bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
Refering to JM Capozzi's earlier post about speed over time, I would suggest
that the dirk would be your best bet.  Speed plays a more important
role than most give credit.
<br>Penaden Songweaver
<br>Vizier of Akalabeth
<br><A HREF="http://www.lostorder.com">http://www.lostorder.com</A>
<br>on a side note: J.M.  if you are the programmer in charge of bards,
would you mind addressing some of the issues we have put forth on the bardic
petition that was circulated a while back?
<br>are any changes like these in the works?
<br>link is <A HREF="http://members.tripod.com/sfdguild/testbard.htm">http://members.tripod.com/sfdguild/testbard.htm</A>
<p>David Lendrum wrote:
<blockquote TYPE=CITE> <font color="#000000"><font size=-1>Decisions
aplenty...I am a level 27 bard and I can't figure out which weapons to
use. I have a barbed leather whip, dragoon dirk, demon claws, polished
granite tomahawk, and screaming mace. I know I want to use my claws just
cause they look so cool ; ) but they can only be worn in primary hand =(
I am wondering if I should go for the dmg (barbed whip) or speed (dragoon
dirk)? My 1h blunt is pretty low (27) so in my mind I have probably already
ruled it out, and the PGT's shield skin song hurts more than helps at higher
levels since the first hit the mob gets in when it wears offis for dmg
based on your low agil. Any feedback would be appreciated!</font></font><font color="#000000"><font size=-1>Karnek
D'Jester L27 Bard - Erollisi Marr</font></font></blockquote>

</body>
</html>
